item.description:
Our Second Vegetarian/Organic Meetup is will be on December 14th at 4:00p.m. at my house in Coventry (directions below). We know it is tough to find time for a Meetup in December but after our first meeting on November 22nd at the Garden Grille Cafe we want to keep the momentum going! I look forward to seeing everyone I met on the 22nd and I am also excited to meet our new members.

We decided to have a potluck. I will be making Vegan Chili, if you would like to bring a dish (optional) please make sure that it is Vegan. I look forward to seeing everyone on December 14th. Please remember to RSVP and feel free to bring a friend.

Directions:

I-95 to exit 6 (the exit after 6a)

Right at end of ramp (on to Route 3 North)

Straight through first stop light

Just before second stop light, turn Left on Magnolia Drive (look for Wood Estates sign)

Second Right on to Rustic Way

Left on to Circlewood Drive

Second house on Right â€“ 39 Circlewood Drive (Beige raised ranch)

Please let me know if you need any additional information.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Our Second Vegetarian/Organic Meetup is Schedule for December 14th at 4:00p.m!
